title: 神奇宝贝服务器设置某世界不刷新精灵
author: Super_Wanzi
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
1.在地皮世界输入
/gamerule doMobSpawning false
若不行
再输入
/mvm set monsters false和
/mvm set animals false
然后输入/killall

2.打开服务器目录，找到config文件夹
打开pixelmon.cfg
找到
    # Allow random generation of structures such as Pokemon Centers, shrines, and other buildings if true.
    B:"Allow Structures to Spawn"=true
这些
设置为
    B:"Allow Structures to Spawn"=false
即可
